'''13w42b''' is the thirteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.7.2]], released on October 18, 2013<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2013/10/minecraft-snapshot-13w42a/</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w42a]] snapshot.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Options]]'''
* Language selection 
** "Force Unicode Font" button added.
** Allows changing whether Unicode font is forced for text or not.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Options]]'''
* Language selection
** The first 32 characters of the codepage 437 font (<code>ascii.png</code>) have been replaced to support some more languages without having to change the font.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=13w42b|prefix=Minecraft
|;prev
|35614|Any 8-bit encoding corresponds to the same number in codepage 437 instead.
|35615|Damaged enchanted items don't have damage bars, but are damaged.
|35642|Wobble shader broken.
|35653|Hopper: java.lang.NullPointerException: Ticking player.
|35655|Game crashes when changing the player sound slider.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* [[13w42a]] and the April Fools' version [[3D Shareware v1.34]] both have the same protocol version as 13w42b.
* 13w42b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
* 13w42b is the earliest snapshot to play music from the [[2013 Music Update]].
